articles.description: Shares in this once-hot sector have dropped 25% since mid-February, highlighting the risk of jumping into the latest sure bet

articles.author: Nicole Nicole
articles.title: Feds warn organizations not to take a cyber vacation after high-profile hacking on holidays - CBS News
articles.description: In a joint advisory, the FBI and CISA said they "observed an increase in highly impactful ransomware attacks occurring on holidays and weekends — when offices are normally closed."
articles.content: Ahead of Labor Day weekend, the FBI and the Department of Homeland Security's cyber arm urged companies and organizations to remain on alert for ransomware attacks. The alert follows a string of high… [+4056 chars]

articles.author: WCCO-TV Staff
articles.title: Halfway Through, Just Shy Of 600K Admissions At 2021 State Fair So Far - CBS Minnesota
articles.description: At this time in 2019, there had been about 925,000 admissions at the State Fair -- three of those days actually set new single-day records. In 2018, that figure was at 882,000.
articles.content: MINNEAPOLIS (WCCO) — Nearly 600,000 admissions have been tallied at the 2021 Minnesota State Fair, as a combination of rainy weather and ongoing concerns over the COVID-19 Delta variant have put a se… [+1148 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Majority of U.S. companies may mandate COVID-19 vaccine in coming months - survey - Reuters
articles.description: More than half of U.S. companies are planning to impose COVID-19 vaccine mandates in the workplace by year end, with almost a quarter considering vaccination as a condition for employment, according to a national survey of nearly 1,000 employers.
